Emory Language Information Toolkit (ELIT)¶

Contents:

class elit.graph.NLPGraph(edges=None)[source]¶

Bases: igraph.Graph

class elit.graph.NLPGraph2(nodes=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Parameters:nodes (Tuple[NLPNode]) – dependency nodes.

A root node is automatically added as the first element in the graph. The iterator skips the root node and starts with the first “real” node. The length of the graph is the number of “real” nodes.
